item.title: We Posted Our Third Manuscript!
item.description: In February 2023 we submitted our third manuscript describing the humanities and social sciences job market, entitled “Beyond the Leaky Pipeline: A Quantitative Analysis of the Academic Job Market in Humanities and Social Sciences.” Dr. Mollet drove this analysis; Thank-you for Burroughs Wellcome Fund for the funds! We posted our manuscript on Open Science Framework.

item.title: Welcome to Dr. Lily Cheng!
item.description:
This fall we welcomed a new member to the research team, Dr. You (Lily) Cheng! Dr. Cheng (she/her/hers) is a postdoctoral research fellow at Harvard Medical School where she studies dementia. Dr. Cheng is a neuroscientist, data scientist, and science communicator.

Dr. Cheng joined the team as a volunteer to enhance our research with her knowledge and skills in machine learning.

We look forward to a great collaboration!

item.title: Welcome to Dr. Amanda Mollet!
item.description:
This summer we welcomed a new member to the research team, Dr. Amanda Mollet! Dr. Mollet (she/her/hers) is a researcher exploring questions of equity and inclusion in higher education from individual, organizational, and ecological perspectives.

Dr. Mollet has joined the team on a contract basis to lead a project exploring the outcomes of social science & humanity researcher applicants to assistant professor tenure-track positions.

We look forward to a great collaboration!

item.title: We Need a Social Scientist!
item.description:
In 2019-20 we ran a detailed survey to assess the faculty job market, collected applicant demographics, and expanded our data collection efforts to include social science researchers. However, as the collaboration was formed by biomedical researchers, we are now looking an individual to lead the social science data analysis and manuscript writing.

Submit an application (including: cover letter, CV, and writing sample) to Nafisa Jadavji, PhD extended to May 13th, 2022. Notification shortly thereafter to successful candidate, with a start date of June 1st 2022.
